name: Fresh Blood
description:
Proto platformer retro game with an idea to collect blood of villager to save the princess in the house. If we got no blood, the vampire will drink her blood.

to kill the enemies : press q

Yes its true, the vampire is on the house, just press c to see the next view of the game I do not make.

Merci à Choucroute pour le thème musical.

Les assets sont issus de la page  : https://rgsdev.itch.io/
